name: Prophet
attributes: Father of Prophets, Patriarch of monotheism
deeds: Return to Islamic Tradition Main Page
description:
Islam recognizes 25 prophets by name in the Quran, though many more were sent throughout history.
                All prophets brought the same core message: worship Allah alone (Tawhid). They are models of righteousness,
                patience, and submission to the Divine will.

Title: Khalilullah (Friend of Allah)

Father of monotheism, builder of the Kaaba, willing to sacrifice his son for Allah.
                    Patriarch of all three Abrahamic faiths.
